definition: to wind/to coil/to spool/to loop around/winding
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: The coil is a wound conductive wire having a cross-section of rectangular-shape.
sentences.chinese: 線圈是通過卷繞截面爲扁平形狀的導線而得到的。

sentences.english: Firstly, the characteristics of "non-round" winding is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 首先，分析了“非圓”卷繞系統特點。

sentences.english: The products are made of metallized polypropylene film, seal with epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 金屬化聚丙烯膜卷繞而成，阻燃環氧樹脂封封。

sentences.english: The driving mechanism further realizes flexible winding of multi-head cords.
sentences.chinese: 也可使多頭線繩實現柔性卷繞。

sentences.english: The tin wire was spooled  after it was used.
sentences.chinese: 焊絲用完後已卷繞起來了。

sentences.english: Besides, the thread rope is respectively curled around the pollex and the middle finger and can prevent the cover body from falling off.
sentences.chinese: 且該線繩分別卷繞於姆指及中指上，可防止套體脫落。

sentences.english: Non- inductively wound with metallized polypropylene film.
sentences.chinese: 金屬化聚丙烯作介質，無感式卷繞。

sentences.english: The application prospects of spirally wound lead acid batteries were presented.
sentences.chinese: 展望了卷繞式鉛酸蓄電池的應用前景。

sentences.english: The electrode assembly is formed by winding the first and second electrode plates and the separator.
sentences.chinese: 電極組件通過卷繞第一和第二電極板以及隔板形成。

sentences.english: Complex accumulations of membranes consisting of vesicular and coiled membranous structures might develop within the plasmalemma invaginations.
sentences.chinese: 質膜內陷中的內含物以小泡和卷繞的膜結構形式存在。

sentences.english: Gradually expanding machine head, reducing energy consumption, improving the winding yarn.
sentences.chinese: 逐步擴大機臺頭數，降低能耗，完善卷繞紗筒。

sentences.english: The winding tension can be adjusted at ease in pre-take-up roller.
sentences.chinese: 卷繞張力可以在超喂羅拉上任意調節。

sentences.english: The ways to determine the wound coil number and the thickness of sectional warp were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 最後討論了條帶卷繞圈數及條帶厚度的確定方法。

sentences.english: The grooved drum is a shaped part which is widely used in bobbin winding machines.
sentences.chinese: 槽筒是自動絡筒機上用於卷繞成形的關鍵零件。

sentences.english: Due to the brittleness of fiber, the godet and wingding rollers with large diameter were used.
sentences.chinese: 由於光纖比較脆，採用了大尺寸的導絲盤和卷繞筒。

sentences.english: The skein after winding is characterized by even thickness and good form.
sentences.chinese: 卷繞後的絲片具有厚薄均勻，成形良好的特點。
